name: The Legend of Sword and Fairy 5 Prequel
summary: The Legend of Sword and Fairy 5 Prequel is an action role-playing game developed by Softstar Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. It is the seventh installment in the Legend of Sword and Fairy (or Chinese Paladin) video game series and is the prequel of The Legend of Sword and Fairy 5. Set in a fictional version of ancient China, the game is based on the wuxia genre with elements of fantasy.

alternative_names.name: Xiānjiàn Qíxiá Zhuàn Wǚ Qián Zhuàn
